metadata.title: USN-5159-1 -- bl vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that bl incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5159-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-bl - 0.9.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
